title: I am not the leader of my club anymore.
body: So ever since the "Issues" with clubs has been fixed I have not been in the club which i am the leader in.  My friend who is a co owner has shown me that it still shows I am in the club and still the owner but under my own club tab my only option is to create a club.  Any help with this issue, I had a fair amount of people in my club and would Like to have it back as my tag as well as being able to access it again.

replies.body:
This is an issue that [we're aware of](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) and we're investigating into this. 

If you can provide me the Club name and tag, it will help me for tracking purposes. Let me know if you have any questions.

Club Name : Hiten Mitsurugi Ryu
Club Tag : SHURA
I have the same problem my club name is AllOfTheLoli and the tag is #AOTL
I'm also having this issue. My everybody else is still in the club, but I'm not.

Sam probleme here, leader in the clubs, but not in the club :'(

Club Name : Blood Warlords
Club tag : BWrd

Same issue, everyone sees me in the club, except im at 0/3 clubs, and im the club owner/creator, and cant see my tag, or my club.

Club Name: Darkfriends
Club Tag: ]DF[

Please fix! We cant invite!

i have the same problem, i was the club leader now we have no leader only officers
Club Name: All Day
Club Tag: Cutie
